markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 34 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29 [Pug Tingwheely](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2103) **Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 20 **Perception** +19; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +18, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +16, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +15, [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +18, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +21 **Str** +0 **Dex** +6 **Con** +1 **Int** +2 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +4 **Items** _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=76)_ (60 arrows), [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43) --- **AC** 29 **Fort** +15 **Ref** +20 **Will** +17 +1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) **HP** 95 **Weaknesses** [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=272) 10 **Evasion** When Pin rolls a success on a Reflex save, he gets a critical success instead.
**Nimble Dodge** **Trigger** Pin is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker he can see; **Effect** Pin gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. --- **Speed** 15 feet, fly 45 feet **Melee** shortsword +18 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d6+10 piercing **Ranged** _longbow_ +19 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [volley 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)), **Damage** 2d6+10 piercing **Primal Innate Spells** DC 26 - **Cantrips (4th)** [Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280) - **2nd** [Entangle](/Spells.aspx?ID=103), [Faerie Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=107) - **3rd** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159) - **4th** [Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) (at will; self only) **Sprinkle Pixie Dust** ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) Pin sprinkles pixie dust onto one of his arrows. If Pin hits a creature with that arrow before his next turn, the arrow inflicts one of the following special effects instead of dealing damage. Each effect depends on the target's DC 26 Will save. On a critical hit, the target treats its save result as one degree worse.
  • **Befuddlement** ([enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) On a failed Will save, the target is [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) for 1 minute (stupefied 2 on a critical failure).
  • **Charm** ([emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The target suffers the result of a 4th-level [_charm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=34) spell, except it doesn't gain a bonus to its save if the only [hostile act](/Rules.aspx?ID=300) was Pin firing his bow, and Pin can choose to direct the target's adoration to another creature rather than himself.
  • **Memory Loss** ([divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) On a failed Will save, the target loses the last 5 minutes of its memory. Pin can add a single false memory if he chooses, which is the only memory the target retains in that time period.
  • **Reckless Pride** ([emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The target suffers the result of [_delusional pride_](/Spells.aspx?ID=414).
name: Pug Tingwheely

text: Pug Tingwheely Recall Knowledge - Fey (Nature): DC 34 Unspecific Lore : DC 32 Specific Lore : DC 29 Pug Tingwheely Source Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows pg. 20 Perception +19; low-light vision Languages Common Skills Acrobatics +18, Deception +16, Nature +15, Performance +18, Stealth +21 Str +0 Dex +6 Con +1 Int +2 Wis +3 Cha +4 Items +1 striking longbow (60 arrows), Shortsword --- AC 29 Fort +15 Ref +20 Will +17 +1 status to all saves vs. magic HP 95 Weaknesses cold iron 10 Evasion When Pin rolls a success on a Reflex save, he gets a critical success instead. Nimble Dodge Reaction Trigger Pin is targeted with a melee or ranged attack by an attacker he can see; Effect Pin gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. --- Speed 15 feet, fly 45 feet Melee Single Action shortsword +18 (Agile, Finesse, Magical, versatile S), Damage 1d6+10 piercing Ranged Single Action longbow +19 (deadly d10, Magical, range increment 100 feet, volley 20 feet), Damage 2d6+10 piercing Primal Innate Spells DC 26 - Cantrips (4th) Dancing Lights, Detect Magic, Ghost Sound, Shield - 2nd Entangle, Faerie Fire - 3rd Dispel Magic, Illusory Disguise - 4th Invisibility (at will; self only) Sprinkle Pixie Dust Single Action (Manipulate) Pin sprinkles pixie dust onto one of his arrows. If Pin hits a creature with that arrow before his next turn, the arrow inflicts one of the following special effects instead of dealing damage. Each effect depends on the target's DC 26 Will save. On a critical hit, the target treats its save result as one degree worse. Befuddlement (enchantment, mental) On a failed Will save, the target is stupefied 1 for 1 minute (stupefied 2 on a critical failure). Charm (emotion, enchantment, incapacitation, mental) The target suffers the result of a 4th-level charm spell, except it doesn't gain a bonus to its save if the only hostile act was Pin firing his bow, and Pin can choose to direct the target's adoration to another creature rather than himself. Memory Loss (divination, mental) On a failed Will save, the target loses the last 5 minutes of its memory. Pin can add a single false memory if he chooses, which is the only memory the target retains in that time period. Reckless Pride (emotion, enchantment, mental) The target suffers the result of delusional pride .
